title: What is the iPhone 12 series cost in Dubai? - Quora

response.answer_text: [Image Source: Google Images] iPhone 12 series consists of four iPhones named as and iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max. All four models will be available in 64GB, 128GB, and 256GB models. Following are starting iPhone 12 prices in Dubai: IPhone 12 - Starting at Dhs 3,399 iPhone 12 Mini - Dhs 2,999 iPhone 12 Pro - Dhs 4,199 iPhone 12 Pro Max - Dhs 4,699
